name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Work logger - one click work logging

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click to record browser titles and make note of what you worked on

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Finding it hard to recollect what things you worked on? 
Does status meeting mean scrambling to remember your work?

Worry not, Weekly Status - One click work logging will help you keep track of things you worked on.

How to use?
- When to work on a ticket or a task, click on Weekly Status logo
- The plugin will record the title on the tab
- Continue clicking on the icon as you work on more and more tasks
- When it's time to gather all information, go to 'Options' and click on 'Copy'
- This will gather all collected statuses on a clipboard
- Your status is now ready to be pasted to your favourite tool
- To clear your work log, click on 'Clear' button

Note: This feature is still in beta. Do share feedback
